name: Investing.com
desc: Investing.com is a financial markets platform providing real-time data, quotes, charts, financial tools, breaking news and analysis across 250 exchanges around the world with 44 languages editions. With more than 21 million monthly users and over 180 million sessions, Investing.com is one of the top three global financial websites in the world. In July 2019 Investing.com has decided to monetize the real-time investor's activities such as: Sentiments, Price Alerts, Portfolios, Search coverage Those DataSets covering 40,000 instruments / 130 Stock Exchanges / 101 countries from their users localized in over 205 countries.
top_tickers: Bonds, Commodities, Currency, ETF, Forex, Indices, Stocks
secondary_data_sources: App Usage, Data Broker, Geo-location, Social/Sentiment, Web Data, Web Traffic
advantages: Real time data from 21 Millions individual investors
